mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, e.dept_no, e.position_id, e.emp_status, e.hire_date, s.base_pay, s.total_allowance, s.total_deduction, s.actual_pay FROM employee_salary_summary s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE s.salary_month = #{salaryMonth} ORDER BY e.emp_no

SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, d.dept_name, p.position_name, s.base_pay, s.total_allowance, s.total_deduction, s.actual_pay FROM employee_salary_summary s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN departments d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no JOIN positions p ON e.position_id = p.position_id WHERE s.emp_no = #{empNo} AND s.salary_month = #{salaryMonth}
